description: The 311 website allows residents to submit service requests or check the status of existing requests online. The percentage of 311 website uptime, the amount of time the site was available, and the target uptime for each week are available by mousing over columns. The target availability for this site is 99.5%.

name: Performance Metrics - Innovation & Technology - 311 Website Availability
